CustomField.description: The stage in the transaction creation process the Timesheet is in, updated by the application automatically. New - Timesheet has not been approved Ready - Timesheet Approved, ready to be processed Processed - Timesheet has had Transactions created Failed - The process to create Transactions failed - check Debug Log
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The stage in the transaction creation process the Timesheet is in New - Timesheet has not been approved Ready - Timesheet Approved, ready to be processed Processed - Timesheet has had Transactions created Fail - Process to create Transactions failed
CustomField.label: Transaction Creation Status (No Colour)
